clientID.title: Client ID
clientID.description: The OIDC client id public identifier for the app.

clientSecret.title: Client Secret
clientSecret.description: Client Secret sometimes required by identity provider.

CreateAdminUser.title: Create User as Admin
CreateAdminUser.description: When set to true and the user account is created, the user will be a local admin.

CreateAdminIfGroupMember.title: Create Admin If Group Member
CreateAdminIfGroupMember.description: List of groups that should have its members created as local administrators. Set as an Array of Strings of the group identifier

shouldSwitchToLoginWindowWhenLocked.title: Should Switch to Login Window When Locked
shouldSwitchToLoginWindowWhenLocked.description: When set to true and the user locks the current session, XCreds will tell the system to switch to Login Window. The current session will stay active but the user will login with the XCreds Login Windows to resume the session.

discoveryURL.title: Discovery URL
discoveryURL.description: The discovery URL provided by your OIDC / Cloud provider.

EnableFDE.title: Enable Full Disk Encryption (FDE)
EnableFDE.description: Enabled FDE enabled at first login on APFS disks.

EnableFDERecoveryKey.title: Save PRK
EnableFDERecoveryKey.description: Save the Personal Recovery Key (PRK) to disk for the MDM Escrow Service to collect.

EnableFDERecoveryKeyPath.title: FDE Recovery Key Path
EnableFDERecoveryKeyPath.description: Specify a custom path for the recovery key.

loginWindowWidth.title: Login Window Width
loginWindowWidth.description: Login Window webview width (Integer). If this is not defined, it will be full width. Minimum value of 100.

loginWindowHeight.title: Login Window Height
loginWindowHeight.description: Login Window webview height (Integer). If this is not defined, it will be full height. Minimum value of 100.

loginWindowBackgroundImageURL.title: Login Window Background Image URL
loginWindowBackgroundImageURL.description: URL to an image to show in the background while logging in.

passwordChangeURL.title: Password Change URL for Menu
passwordChangeURL.description: Add a menu item for changing the password that will open this URL when the menu item is selected.

redirectURI.title: Redirect URI
redirectURI.description: URI to redirect to when authentication is complete.

refreshRateHours.title: Password Change Check Rate Hours
refreshRateHours.description: The number of hours between checks. Default value: 3. Minimum value: 0. Max value: 168.

refreshRateMinutes.title: Password Change Check Rate Minutes
refreshRateMinutes.description: The number of minutes between checks. Default value: 0. Minimum value: 0. Max value: 59. This value is added to refreshRateHours.

scopes.title: Scopes
scopes.description: Scopes tell the identify provider what information to return. Note that the values are provided with a single space between them. Provide the following values the follow IdPs: Google: profile openid email Azure: profile openid offline_access Note that Google does not support the offline_access scope so instead use the preference shouldSetGoogleAccessTypeToOffline. Azure provides unique_name which is mapped to the local user account by using the prefix before “@” in unique_name and matching to the short name of a user account. Google provides “email” and is matched in the same way.
scopes.note: All scopes should be lowercase and separated by single spaces

shouldSetGoogleAccessTypeToOffline.title: Request Google Refresh Token
shouldSetGoogleAccessTypeToOffline.description: When using Google IdP, a refresh token may need be requested in a non-standard way.

shouldShowCloudLoginByDefault.title: Show Cloud Login By Default
shouldShowCloudLoginByDefault.description: Determine if the mac login window or the cloud login window is shown by default

shouldPreferLocalLoginInsteadOfCloudLogi.title: Show Local Login over Cloud Login
shouldPreferLocalLoginInsteadOfCloudLogi.description: Favor using XCreds' local login screen over the cloud login UI.

shouldVerifyPasswordWithRopg.title: Use ROPG when testing password
shouldVerifyPasswordWithRopg.description: When verifying password in the menu app, use ROPG.

ropgClientID.title: ROPG Client ID
ropgClientID.description: ROPG Client ID for use when checking password

ropgClientSecret.title: ROPG Client Secret
ropgClientSecret.description: ROPG Client Secret for use when checking password

autoRefreshLoginTimer.title: Automatically Refresh Login Window (seconds)
autoRefreshLoginTimer.description: Timer for automatically refreshing login screen in seconds. If set to 0, does not automatically refresh.

cloudLoginText.title: Cloud Login Text
cloudLoginText.description: Text for return to cloud login on Mac login screen

shouldShowConfigureWifiButton.title: Show Configure WiFi
shouldShowConfigureWifiButton.description: Show Configure WiFi button in XCreds Login.

shouldShowPreferencesOnStart.title: Show Preferences on Startup
shouldShowPreferencesOnStart.description: If no settings are specified, preferences will not be shown on startup.

shouldShowMacLoginButton.title: Show Mac Login Window button
shouldShowMacLoginButton.description: Show the Mac Login Window button in XCreds Login.

shouldShowLocalOnlyCheckbox.title: Show Local Only Checkbox
shouldShowLocalOnlyCheckbox.description: Show the local only checkbox on the local login page

usernamePlaceholder.title: Username Placeholder Text
usernamePlaceholder.description: Placeholder text in local / AD login window for username

passwordPlaceholder.title: Password Placeholder Text
passwordPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text in local / AD login window for password

shouldShowSupportStatus.title: Show Support Status Message
shouldShowSupportStatus.description: Show message in XCreds Login reminding people to buy support.

shouldShowQuitMenu.title: Show Quit Menu Item
shouldShowQuitMenu.description: Show Quit Menu Item in the menu.

shouldShowVersionInfo.title: Show Version and Build Number
shouldShowVersionInfo.description: Show the version number and build number in the lower left corner of XCreds Login.

username.title: Local Username
username.description: When a user uses cloud login, XCreds will try and figure out the local username based on the email or other data returned for the IdP. Use this value to force the local username for any cloud login. Provide only the shortname.

verifyPassword.title: Verify Cloud Password
verifyPassword.description: Show prompt to verify cloud password before setting keychain and login.

idpHostName.title: IDP Host Name
idpHostName.description: hostname of the page that has the password field.

idpHostNames.title: idpHostNames
idpHostNames.description: array of hostnames of the page that has the password field.

passwordElementID.title: Password Element ID
passwordElementID.description: password element id of the html element that has the password.

KeychainReset.title: Keychain Reset
KeychainReset.description: Reset the keychain without prompting if the login password doesn't match the local password.

PasswordOverwriteSilent.title: Overwrite Password Silently
PasswordOverwriteSilent.description: Update the password silently to the new one. Used with the KeychainReset if the user has a secure token.

SecureTokenManagementUsername.title: Secure Token Management Username
SecureTokenManagementUsername.description: Username to use for the secure token management account

SecureTokenManagementPasswordLocation.title: Secure Token Management Password Location
SecureTokenManagementPasswordLocation.description: The location to read the Secure Token management password

map_firstname.title: First Name OIDC Mapping
map_firstname.description: Local DS to OIDC Mapping for First Name

map_lastname.title: Last Name OIDC Mapping
map_lastname.description: Local DS to OIDC Mapping for Last Name

map_fullname.title: Full Name OIDC Mapping
map_fullname.description: Local DS to OIDC Mapping for Name

map_username.title: Username OIDC Mapping
map_username.description: Local DS to OIDC Mapping for Name

shouldShowRefreshBanner.title: Show Refresh Banner
shouldShowRefreshBanner.description: Show text at the top of the prompt window when tokens expire.

shouldFindPasswordElement.title: Find Password Element
shouldFindPasswordElement.description: This finds the password by finding the HTML element that has bullets (type=password)

localAdminUserName.title: Local Admin User Name
localAdminUserName.description: Username of local admin user. DO NOT SET THIS IN PREFERENCES. It is recommended to set this with the settingsOverrideScriptPath script. This user is used to reset the keychain if the user forgets their local password and to setup a secure token for newly created users.

localAdminPassword.title: Local Admin Password
localAdminPassword.description: Password of local admin user. DO NOT SET THIS IN PREFERENCES. It is recommended to set this with the settingsOverrideScriptPath script. This user is used to reset the keychain if the user forgets their local password and to setup a secure token for newly created users.

shouldDetectNetworkToDetermineLoginWindo.title: Should Detect Network ToDetermine LoginWindow
shouldDetectNetworkToDetermineLoginWindo.description: Check if network is up. If not, select username and password login window.

settingsOverrideScriptPath.title: Override Script Path
settingsOverrideScriptPath.description: Script to override defaults. Must return valid property list with specified defaults. Script must exist at path ,be owned by _securityagent and  writable and executable only by _securityagent.
